website_summaries.verdict: A handsome resin pub-style bar with 4 chairs that are surprisingly comfortable, even without cushions.
pros: Built-in and easy-to-reach ice bucket has a drain plug
Each chair has leg rests, and each seat has a weight capacity of 350 pounds
Sturdy all-weather wicker is a breeze to clean
cons: Ice bucket liner could rust if not kept indoors when not in use

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I am writing to give a heads up about the assembly of this set. Many of the reviews stated that it was difficult to put together, it is time consuming. But the one thing I recommend is to ignore step 2 and attach the legs to the basket before attaching legs to the table. Attach basket to the legs and then attach the whole piece to the table. Good Luck and Enjoy !!
customer_reviews.author: kelli mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for bird poop
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and chairs are comfortable but it was a pain to put together. The holes don't line up. Also, I strongly suggest placing the ice bucket holder before attaching the legs to the table. Otherwise it is difficult to get it in there. Also, keep the ice bucket liner indoors unless using it. It will rust. Looking for a cover now. Bird poop is very difficult to clean off this furniture.
customer_reviews.author: The Novel LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely interesting.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it'll last for a good while. I'm happy we purchased the patio dining set cover to protect it, especially during the pollen season!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Glynn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously hard to put together!
customer_reviews.text: As most reviews have mentioned, the table is ridiculously hard to put together, especially if you follow the directions! To put it together quickly: 1) You need two people. 2) Attach the legs to the ice bucket leaving the bolts very loose. 3) Have the second person force the legs until they line up with the holes on the table top while the first person puts the bolts in. 4) After you have all the bolts in, then tighten everything up. Once it’s together properly, the table is very sturdy and the chairs are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not good material
customer_reviews.text: Received a Damaged table top and damaged chair. It seems like it won’t last long, really upset that this product reviews made it seem it was a good product but not worth it. I contacted the seller and haven’t heard from them and it’s been four days. I will change my review of items get replaced.
customer_reviews.author: cesilia

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm.....
customer_reviews.text: Took HOURS to put together!!!!! Instructions are ridiculous. If you want the ice bucket section to line up, do not follow directions! Put the ice bucket holder on first and then the table top or it will cost you hours if your day & you’ll still never get it done. Prob took 6 hours to put tiger with help! It’s a nice looking set tho & worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the table and chairs for my patio it took quite a while for me to put together. It was probably just me but bolts and holes just didn’t lineup as easily as I had hoped The underside of the table top seems like it’s made out of some kind of composite so I have to make sure I keep it covered when I’m not using it because I really think the rain might damage it. The woven materials the set is made with seems strong and the whole set looks very expensive Overall I love it And I’m looking forward to having a party so I can show off my new Patio set
customer_reviews.author: ginger j.

customer_reviews.title: An Epic Annoyance
customer_reviews.text: It would have been easy to put together, but only 3 out of 4 holes lined up. I’ve gotten used to these wrenches, but this was especially difficult because of the poor quality. On the plus side: chairs are comfortable, table is level. I suggest putting the lower part of the table together then attach the top. All in all: An epic annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Astafan

customer_reviews.title: Putting this together nearly sent me over the edge.
customer_reviews.text: Basket installation was nearly impossible. Is ruffled with that step for at least an hour. Instructions are not great. Working with an Allen wrench is so awful. Do yourself a favor and use a drill with an Allen bit or you will probably end up wanting to burn the entire set. Comfortable and seemingly study 4 hours later though.
customer_reviews.author: SMRock707

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our new table & chars! They are sturdy & look great on our patio. My husband put them together & was a little unhappy with the directions, but he was very happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t leave reviews but I have to say this was the most difficult piece of furniture I’ve ever put together.. it took hours to put the table together, the holes clearly didn’t line up and had to be musculed into place by a 2nd person while i attempted to catch a thread on the screw.. if u are not handy and don’t have ALOT of patience avoid this set, though when it was finally assembled after countless hrs of labor and a sore back it is pretty nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on our deck!
customer_reviews.text: According to the reviews this is "hard to assemble", my husband had no trouble with it but did say the bars that hold the stools together has a slight difference in the holes because of the angle of the seat, once u see which end is slightly wider, the holes line up and it's a wonderful set!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice table and chairs.
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs of the chair were damaged. Was able to straighten and buy a new cap. That was my reason for 4 stars. I put this set together by myself. Took maybe 45-50 minutes. Nice set
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and affordable- easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and affordable- easy to put together. We had a minor issue with one chair but the company made it right immediately. Great communication and very fast delivery. Would definitely buy again. Also, purchased a round cover to protect it....
customer_reviews.author: Chaviva Yovel

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My advice is, keep all screws loose until you have them in place, especially the ice bucket holder and then tighten. Still difficult but more chance of success.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to assemble and i consider my self a handyman. Looks good though
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Leon

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our front porch. Ordered a piece of glass for top (drinks sit more securely). Placed a planter inside cooler. Lightweight pieces for this 61 year old decorator who likes to move furniture around.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McMonigle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am such a fan of Amazon. They always have just what I'm looking for. We haven't used the set much but it looks great on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Love , love love this set. Chairs are so comfy....a nice suprise
customer_reviews.author: CC-MD

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very comfortable with out cushions! Works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and is comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these tables and chairs for a retail space that has a deck. The chairs are comfortable and it's a nice size. It wasn't easy to assemble but it looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Baker

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not the best
customer_reviews.text: Two of the chairs are unable to be assembled they do not line up with the materials provided I've sent a request to Amazon for a refund or to be credited for two of the chairs I've not had any correspondence back
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Rusty!
customer_reviews.text: Metal legs fill up with water and a pool of rusty water washes down on your deck. Otherwise, they are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Mare S

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble, the Allen screws were awkwardly positioned and difficult to get to. Some of the screw holes were not lined up accurate and two of the chair legs are not even.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mild steel pipes rust, staining deck
customer_reviews.text: Major issue is water getting into pipes and rust leaks out and stains your deck. Maybe using tread tape could stop the leaking in. It is great looking design of table and chairs, we are sad we have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry McGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The chairs and table are very solid and comfortable once assembled. The instructions are easy to follow. However, one suggestion is to loosely assemble each piece completely before you tighten down any screws. The holes don't always line up easily so a loose fitting will help as you progress.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The item is poorly made I don't believe it'll last a summer for the price very cheaply made from China
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable set
customer_reviews.text: Y’all! We sit outside all the time now! Chairs were easy, the table made us cuss. Worth. Every. Minute!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks great it’s comfortable and sturdy. Came with exact amount of screws! Took me and hubby about hour and a half including unwrapping all the bubble wrap and tape. We also put bucket part on before attach table top. We purchased a cover but not delivers yet.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Assembly of Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The foot support could not be tightly flushed against the leg base. Rain water creates a rush issue on the legs of the chairs. Concern that the table set will need replacing soon.
customer_reviews.author: SPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Chairs are super comfortable. A little bit of a pain to put together but it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. I came together beautifully, but I would definitely recommend you have it professionally assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price! I have received multiple compliments on it!!! It was difficult to put together as it took my husband a couple of hours to complete but it was worth it after it was all said and done!
customer_reviews.author: Melodye

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table and chairs , assembly was actually very easy , took about 45 minutes to put everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Albert N

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the table tips over easily. It is outdoor furniture and the top of the table retains water when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Do not follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble. Just put basket in before tightening all legs. Looks great on my deck
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a screened in porch. It is our new favorite table for meals. Very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble and time consuming, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The patio furniture set is so pretty and very sturdy. We love the ice bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Benavides

customer_reviews.title: ... chairs were delivered 2 days early and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The table and chairs were delivered 2 days early and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this despite assembling frustrations
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to assemble, because not all the holes are aligned. But once it is assembled, it looks wonderful. For the price, we got a good patio furniture. It is sturdy, plastic wicker seems little cheap, but they do the job
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: Gray patio set
customer_reviews.text: The set is comfortable, classy, and looks great on the patio by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Hey love my 5 piece table set excellent and easy to put together another great buy for amazon thanks
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but a little difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this set. It is a great addition to our pool area. It allows for beverage storage and additional seating while chatting with family and friends poolside. Some of the wicker partially covered the bolt holes on the chairs causing a bit of difficulty assembling them. The ice bucket basket on the table didn’t line up with the legs, so I had to get my husband to help figure that out. Now that it is put together and in place, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laxmom52

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 5-Piece Outdoor Wicker Bar Table Bistro Set for Patio, Backyard w/Ice Bucket, 4 Chairs - Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownComplement your outdoor living space with the perfect bistro set. Made of weather-resistant wicker and a sturdy steel frame, this 5-piece outdoor set is built to last. The table's convenient built-in ice pail ensures guests will never be without a drink. This set is sure to make any backyard the place to be for outdoor socials.Specifications:Table Dimensions: 31"(Dia) x 36.5"(H)Chair: 20"(L) x 18"(W) x 43"(H)Floor-to-Seat: 22"(H)Backrest: 19"(H)Ice Pail: 16"(Dia) x 9.5"(H)Chair Weight Capacity: 330 lbs.Table Weight Capacity: 187 lbs.Weight (Box A): 8.8 lbs.Weight (Box B): 68.5 lbs.Color: BrownMaterial: Steel, WickerAssembly required (with instructions)Package Includes:Table(4) ChairsBuilt-in ice bucket
feature_bullets: ICE BUCKET: The table is conveniently equipped with a built-in ice bucket underneath the tabletop, so your favorite cold drinks are always available; fits up to 12 cans or 3 champagne bottles
STURDY, DURABLE MATERIALS: A steel frame and quality, all-weather wicker allow for easy maintenance and long-lasting use to make this set a mainstay in your outdoor living space
UNIQUE, BAR-HEIGHT CHAIRS: Bar-style chairs have a chic yet comfortable design, with footrests, curved seat edges, and tall, curved backrests that promote comfort and healthy posture
VERSATILE AND ATTRACTIVE: Stylish bistro set complements nearly any outdoor setting, making it the perfect set for social gatherings in your backyard or on the patio

GREAT FOR THE FAMILY: With 4 chairs included, this set is perfect for families to enjoy a delicious meal while taking in some fresh air; TABLE DIMENSIONS: 31"(Dia) x 36.5"(H); Chair Weight Capacity: 330 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
